ModMetaData.name: Meal Printer
ModMetaData.author: SomewhereOutInSpace
ModMetaData.description: Meal Printer aims to bring simple, balanced automated meal production to Rimworld's mid-to-late game.\n\nMeal Printers are the spacer-tech evolution of nutrient paste dispensers, using protein resequencing and primitive molecular printing to convert raw foodstuffs into filling, wholesome meals. They can produce simple meals or fine meals, and can also be configured for high-efficiency nutrient paste or bulk NutriBar production.
